definition: abbrevation of the botanical name of each species
comment: includes outlier species (73) with occurance in less than 4 plots over all sampling periods such as: Acer_camp, Acer_pseu, Ajug_rept, Alli_fist

definition: abundance of species in the plot 01_A1y21 after Londo (1976)
comment: Londo scale transformed to percentage scale via Traxler (1997) Table 23 columne "mit.D" / Londo G (1976): The decimal scale for releves of permanent quadrats. Vegetatio 33, (61-64) / Traxler A (1997): Handbuch des vegetationsökologischen Monitorings. Umweltbundesamt Wien
